description.displayText: Megan is absolutely wonderful! She loves my girls like her own. She goes above and beyond our expectations!
description.originalText: Megan is absolutely wonderful! She loves my girls like her own. She goes above and beyond our expectations!

description.displayText: Ever since I met Megan a year ago, she has been a positive light in my life. Having worked alongside her professionally and having gotten to know her personally, Megan is one of the most caring and patient friends which I know will translate into being a great caretaker for any little one. Her sweet, warmhearted disposition will allow her to connect with any kiddo she meets. Megan has everyone's best interest at heart and will go above and beyond to make sure any family feels safe and comfortable with their children under her care. With a background in social work as well as children's nonprofits, Megan is professional and knows how to communicate effectively to be a well-rounded and reliable care taker.

description.displayText: When my children were younger, Megan was the first person I'd call whenever I needed extra help. My kids are older now, but they still speak very highly of her. I appreciate that she engages with the children on their level and makes each one feel important. She's always on time, responsible, conscientious and friendly. I highly recommend her services.
description.originalText: When my children were younger, Megan was the first person I'd call whenever I needed extra help. My kids are older now, but they still speak very highly of her. I appreciate that she engages with the children on their level and makes each one feel important. She's always on time, responsible, conscientious and friendly. I highly recommend her services.

description.displayText: Megan has been a long time caregiver for my son. She was punctual and responsible and cared for my son while he was very young. She became a trusted part of our family and was a tremendous resource to me. I highly recommend her to any family looking for a sitter to develop a long-term relationship with!
description.originalText: Megan has been a long time caregiver for my son. She was punctual and responsible and cared for my son while he was very young. She became a trusted part of our family and was a tremendous resource to me. I highly recommend her to any family looking for a sitter to develop a long-term relationship with!

description.displayText: Megan has been caring for my girls since they were toddlers and they are now 12 and 15.  I totally trust Megan with my daughters, my home, my car and my puppy!  She has stayed with my girls for over a week since they were little and took care of them in every way!!! My daughters are now preteen/teen and they still love her!!! We all love her at the L. home.

description.displayText:
She is very punctual, compassionate and able to care for animals or children! 

She is exceptional! She watched my dog for me a few times throughout the week and was wonderful with him! She would care for him as if he was her own!  I never had to worry about my dog when he was with her! He has separation anxiety and really took to her from the beginning!
